Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/24th
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Cermak, Central Park, 26th, and Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/24th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Cermak, Central Park, 26th, and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/24th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute at 47th/State
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 45th, Wabash, 48th and State due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, 45th, Wabash, 48th and State, due to street blockage near 47th/State.
